intro.title: Passionate full-stack developer based in Montreal
intro.description: I design and build modern, robust, and scalable applications.

apropos.title: About me
apropos.description:
I’m a fresh graduate in computer programming, specialized in full-stack development. Curious, motivated, and eager to learn, I’m looking for exciting projects to challenge myself and grow. I enjoy tackling technical challenges, exploring new technologies, and working on meaningful projects.

My goal: work with dynamic teams, contribute to performant and innovative apps, and keep growing in a creative and learning environment.
apropos.langagesList: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js and Next.js
apropos.diplome1: Diploma in Programming – La Cité College
apropos.diplome2: Bachelor in Information Systems – Bejaia University

projet1.title: Showcase site for cultural events
projet1.description: SpectaLive is a website for a performance venue to display various events: concerts, plays, stand-up, dance shows, etc.

projet2.title: Reservation system
projet2.description: Next.js project for managing reservations in a restaurant.
